title: Permutation eSports Manager Recruitment
body:
(note - we are still taking applications by players for team 2 (add burstfire303 if you havnt yet)! we specifically need coached and top laners!)

by the start of december, it is looking highly likely we will have three (if not four) teams practicing regularly and entering tournaments as we prepare for the oceanic open ladder.

now more than ever we need administrative staff to oversee the running of the org.

we are currently looking for:
a general manager - oversee the running of teams, schedule trainings and scrims etc
a player relations coordinator - make sure players are happy and resolve any issues which may occur
a recruitment manager - your job is basically what im doing right now. you will be in charge of finding players/staff when we need it

to apply, add me in game (burstfire303) and message me. 

i look forward to all your applications! we will only be accepting one person for each role which i will pick next sunday - make sure you dont wait till the last minute as this will negatively impact your chances.

ps - we are also looking for a video editor. add me in game for more info (burstfire303).
